HEADER.TEXT: Feature an event that matters to your friends or community, and let everyone bet or say the truth.
HEADER.HEADER_QUESTION: What will be the weather tomorrow in
TOP_QUESTIONS: Which team will win El Clásico at 3am tonight?
What will be the weather tomorrow in Saigon?
When will the corona virus end?

POPOVER.3: click Create Event to bet on it

SECOND.TITLE: Social Betting is Fun
SECOND.TEXT_1: Have fun betting on the future that’s just yours in private events with friends or publicly with online communities on any social media content.
SECOND.TEXT_2: Start with free tokens, earn when taking risk or not, and cash out anytime.
SECOND.TEXT_3: Play to earn, always for free!
SECOND.CARD_TEXT_1: Engage with followers in social media. Turn your content interactive and create conversations.
SECOND.CARD_TEXT_2: Join public events as an expert to say the truth, or create viral events for Bettery community.
SECOND.CARD_TEXT_3: Bet a dinner or free tokens on personalized topics you all care and love, publicly or in private.

THIRD.TITLE: Go Risky, or Risk-Free
THIRD.TEXT: Create your own events and invite friends or social media to join.
THIRD.TEXT_2: Bet with free tokens to cash out wins or receive a friend’s promise.
THIRD.TEXT_3: Validate the outcome as expert of truth after betting is over.
THIRD.TEXT_4: Advise viral event topics for others and earn from your creativity.
THIRD.TEXT_5: Pick a role that fits your day and start earning for free!

FOUR.TITLE: Why Bettery?
FOUR.TEXT_1: Bet with your opinion and skills - not luck - using free BET tokens and earn while enjoying your hobby. Cash out earnings but never run out of BET when losing in events. Grow reputations and earn extra in Pemium and Pro events hosted by businesses and influencers.
FOUR.TEXT_2: To ensure that no one, not even Bettery team can manipulate events or user balance, Bettery is the first social application with its logic entirely executed on Smart Contracts and events data stored in a tamper-proof storage, and only users can access their own registered wallets.
FOUR.CARD_TEXT_1: Events data and funds stored on Smart Contracts can never be altered by anyone, not even Bettery.
FOUR.CARD_TEXT_2: User reputation is a trustless "proof-of-knowledge" for businesses paying to engage with “pro” users.
FOUR.CARD_TEXT_3: Start with free Tokens and earn more as your reputations grow in business-made events.
FOUR.CARD_TEXT_4: Create or join in topics that matter to you in public or private rooms, and play risky or risk-free.

TOKEN_SALE.TITLE: Bettery Token Sale
TOKEN_SALE.TEXT: Bettery users join events for free to earn BET tokens, which can be swapped into BTY tokens and sold on exchanges. To engage high-profile users, Hosts can use BTY as reward for participants in Premium and Pro events. BTY and BET are key components of the Bettery Tokenomy.
TOKEN_SALE.TEXT_2: Early Hosts and Investors can purchase BTY through Bettery Token Sale
TOKEN_SALE.FULL_TOKENOMICS: Bettery full tokenomics will be launched in:

ROADMAP.TITLE: Roadmap
ROADMAP.TEXT_1: All our development activities - past, present, and future - are always available to the public in our detailed

TEAM.TEXT: Bettery is a platform for enthusiasts, built by enthusiasts. Our humble yet passionate team consists of experts with mastery in distributed systems, creative design, and most importantly, satisfactory user experience.

FEDOR.NAME: Fedor
FEDOR.EXPERTISE: Synergize software development and international B2B sales, worked with the team for years before starting Bettery.

SIM.NAME: Sim
SIM.EXPERTISE: Know what users want based on his previous experience running a mining farm and moderating Facebook content.

MAXIM.NAME: Maxim
MAXIM.EXPERTISE: Fuel the life force of Bettery platform through his deep knowledge of the innerworkings of blockchain infrastructures.

SHANE.NAME: Shane
SHANE.EXPERTISE: Transform endless walls of text into user-friendly and meaningful content that you’ll have a blast reading.

NELSON.NAME: Nelson
NELSON.EXPERTISE: Transform rough wireframe sketches into vivid, intuitive interfaces and designs you’ll never grow tired of using.

ANDREY.NAME: Andrey
ANDREY.EXPERTISE: Give life to ideas and designs mapped out on graphics editors and Powerpoint slides with the power of coding.

JOIN_US_NOW.NAME: Join Us Now
JOIN_US_NOW.TEXT: We’re looking for skilled enthusiasts to help us realize our vision to bring value to people’s opinion shaped by their unique life experiences through social betting.

KEN.NAME: Ken Graham
KEN.EXPERTISE: Evolving regulations of blockchain and cryptocurrency, turning risky into riskless and bring forth its value to the public.

ALLAN.NAME: Allan Ta
ALLAN.EXPERTISE: Applying strategic mind to guide aspiring teams in delivering innovative and market-demanded Blockchain products.

GHEEHOE.NAME: GheeHoe Cheng
GHEEHOE.EXPERTISE: Investing in early-stage startups in green, health, and blockchain economy via strategic ecosystem building blocks.

FORM.TITLE: Are you an Influencer?
FORM.TEXT: We’ll show you how to boost engagement with your followers with every piece of your content, hands-on based right on what matters to you.
FORM.NAME: Name
FORM.PHONE_NUMBER: Best way to contact you (Telegram, Whatsapp, etc.)
FORM.FIRM: Your channel (Where to boost engagements, a public channel)

FOOTER.TEXT_1: Bettery is a social pool betting platform for friends and online communities to have fun on what matters to you. Through betting events, collective social knowledge is created for businesses and influencers, while users earn from their opinions.
FOOTER.TEXT_2: No spam. No ads. Just valuable content that’s a pleasure to read.

MODAL.TITLE: For Investors
MODAL.TEXT: Shared experiences bring people together, not just past memories
MODAL.TEXT-2: - this is why we create Bettery. Our team is happy to discuss opportunities with startup investors who share our vision.
